headline: Ralph Lauren (RL) Valuation Check As Shares Deliver Solid One Year Total Return
summary: Ralph Lauren stock snapshot and key financial context Ralph Lauren (RL) has attracted fresh attention from investors after a period where the share price has moved roughly flat over the past month but sits higher over the past 3 months and past year. At a recent close of US$355.09, the company carries a value score of 1 in this dataset and reports annual revenue of about US$7.57b with net income of roughly US$854.3m, offering a snapshot of current scale and profitability. See our latest...
